subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Nacer Bouhanni won the slippery fourth stage of the Giro d’Italia in a sprint. Michael Matthews retained the overall leader’s pink jersey.
snippet: Nacer Bouhanni won the slippery fourth stage of the Giro d’Italia in a sprint. Michael Matthews retained the overall leader’s pink jersey.
